resources.string: Please enter the account data that has been created
Welcome! \n \nSelect your role to start managing your account and enjoying our app features.
As a Parent, you can set allergies, spending limits, and nutritional requirements for your student
As a Parent, you can monitor your student\'s account balance and purchase history
As a Parent, you can view your student\'s spending and nutrition data in easy-to-understand graphical form
You are ready to go! Find ease in every role and start a new experience with this application
As a Merchant, you can add new menus with details such as name, price, and description of the food
As a Merchant, you can take and confirm orders to ensure the process runs smoothly
As a Merchant, you can receive payments from student balances directly when orders are taken
As a Student, you can log in using the facial recognition feature to ensure security
As a Student, you can confirm food orders easily using facial recognition technology
As a Student, you can view menus and food recommendations that have been adjusted to the restrictions set by your parents
